QuestData.Title: The Hand of Fate
QuestData.Description:
$p,
We have won many battles against the Burning Legion, but it is time to end this war once and for all.
Final preparations have begun to depart for Argus.
Make haste to Stormwind Harbor. A ship awaits you there to grant you and your allies passage to Azuremyst.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet your escort to the Exodar at Stormwind Harbor.

Objectives.Objective: Take the Dalaran portal to Stormwind
